# apptrust_application_version_status (Data Source)

Returns the release status for a specific application version (GET /v1/applications/{application_key}/versions/{version}/status).

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "apptrust_application_version_status" "example" {
  application_key = "my-web-app"
  version         = "1.0.0"
}

output "version_release_status" {
  value = data.apptrust_application_version_status.example.version_release_status
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `application_key` (String) The application key.
- `version` (String) The application version.

### Read-Only

- `version_release_status` (String) Release status: pre_release, released, or trusted_release.
